price: [Isaan] “Rabbitti kakannee! Dhugumatti, ati jallinuma kee kan durii keessa jirta” jedhan.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
